nodes.text: Pie, or in Huttese, patogga, was a general term for a variety of foodstuffs.
Pie was normally a disc-shaped baked good, which could be classed as a main course or a dessert based on its content.

In 1.5 ABY, a spacer on Tatooine embarked on a quest to kill a number of Tusken Raiders after they stole the spacer's pie. This type of pie was not explicitly named, but strongly resembled a food called air cake.
Ewoks were known to partake of several different types of pie.
Super Star Destroyers were sometimes referred to as "pie-shaped."
